prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:


        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "15-Min Teriyaki Chicken Udon Stir-Fry",
  "description": "Family-friendly teriyaki chicken tossed with springy udon and mixed veggies. Mild, glossy sauce and quick stovetop cooking for a weeknight win.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Slice chicken thigh fillets into thin strips.",
    "Mince garlic and slice spring onion.",
    "Open the bag of stir-fry vegetables.",
    "Bring a pot of water to a boil for udon noodles (or microwave-ready packs to loosen, 1 minute).",
    "Measure teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, and sesame oil."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Boil udon noodles until just tender (about 3–4 minutes). Drain and set aside.",
    "Heat peanut oil in a large pan or wok over high heat.",
    "Add chicken strips and black pepper (optional). Stir-fry until lightly browned and cooked through, 4–5 minutes.",
    "Add garlic and half the spring onion. Stir-fry 30 seconds until fragrant.",
    "Add stir-fry vegetables. Toss on high heat for 2–3 minutes until crisp-tender.",
    "Add drained udon noodles. Pour in teriyaki sauce and soy sauce. Toss for 1–2 minutes until glossy and coated.",
    "Turn off heat. Drizzle sesame oil and toss.",
    "Top with remaining spring onion and sesame seeds. Serve hot."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken thigh fillets",
      "quantity": "600 g",
      "preparation": "thinly sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "udon noodles",
      "quantity": "400 g",
      "preparation": "boiled and drained"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "stir-fry vegetables",
      "quantity": "500 g",
      "preparation": "bagged mix"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "teriyaki sauce",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {

      "quantity": "1 tablespoon",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {

      "quantity": "1 tablespoon",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sesame oil",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "2 cloves",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spring onion",
      "quantity": "4",
      "preparation": "sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "pinch",
      "preparation": "optional"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sesame seeds",
      "quantity": "2 teaspoons",
      "preparation": "optional for topping"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],

      "Family"
    ],

}

    }
        ```
        ```json
  ]
}
        ```
